name: Dragon Age: Inquisition - Spoils of the Avvar
name_original: Dragon Age: Inquisition - Spoils of the Avvar
description:
Charge into battle atop war-painted mounts and bring the unfettered spirit of the Avvar to Skyhold.

The Spoils of the Avvar grants you the Avvar Mount Pack, including five exclusive beasts to carry you across Thedas. Suit up for the fight with two sets of unique armor as loot and schematics to protect yourself and give your party an advantage against your enemies. You’ll also get a new theme for Skyhold with exclusive options to customize your base.
